metadata.title: CVE-2016-7945 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in X.org libXi before 1.7.7 allow remote Xservers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory access orinfinite loop) via vectors involving length fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxi6 - 2:1.7.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
